<p> WorldInfo contains a title and persistent documentation or simple metadata information about an X3D scene. <i>Hint:</i> comments are not readable when a model file is loaded for viewing, but WorldInfo and Metadata* nodes are persistent and inspectable at run time. </p> <p> X3D Tooltips of interest: <a href="https://www.web3d.org/x3d/tooltips/X3dTooltips.html#WorldInfo" target="_blank">WorldInfo</a>. </p> <p> <a href="https://www.web3d.org/documents/specifications/19775-1/V3.3/Part01/Architecture.html" target="_blank">X3D Specification</a> sections of interest: <a href="https://www.web3d.org/documents/specifications/19775-1/V3.3/Part01/components/core.html" target="_blank">Core component</a>, <a href="https://www.web3d.org/documents/specifications/19775-1/V3.3/Part01/components/core.html#Concepts" target="_blank">7.2 Concepts</a> and <a href="https://www.web3d.org/documents/specifications/19775-1/V3.3/Part01/components/core.html#WorldInfo" target="_blank">7.4.7 WorldInfo</a>. </p> <p> <a href="https://www.web3d.org/x3d/content/examples/X3dResources.html#Examples" target="_blank">X3D Examples Archives</a> of related interest: </p> <ul> <li> VRML 2 Sourcebook:&nbsp; <a href="https://www.web3d.org/x3d/content/examples/Vrml2Sourcebook/Chapter29WorldInfo" target="_blank">Chapter 29 WorldInfo</a> </li> <li> X3D for Web Authors: <a href="http://x3dgraphics.com/examples/X3dForWebAuthors/Chapter15Metadata" target="_blank">Chapter 15 Metadata</a> </li> </ul>
